product_name: AMC Quiet Water: New Jersey and Eastern Pennsylvania Canoe and Kayak Guide
long_description: Quiet Water New Jersey and Eastern Pennsylvania is great for canoeists and kayakers of all abilities, and features 80 trips that offer the best calm-water paddling in the region.
short_description: Quiet Water New Jersey and Eastern Pennsylvania is great for canoeists and kayakers of all abilities, and features 80 trips that offer the best calm-water paddling in the region.
